name: GDT2: after WW3
description:
beyond an animal, beyond a human, and.................. beyond a God it is a each human`s instinct. and bootlegging when after a World War 3, it is a driving for beyond a Gods` ability...
in this game, you must a bootleg to Mauritania and Zimbabwe DPR, etc... and you must money laundering via refugees...
also, you can craft an item for export to mars, or (if you in mars)supply to lot of shops. and play a few minigames and amusements in Shiki Land Tower, or even enjoy a PC Booth in Somalian Industrial town, etc...
And sometimes you can meet and go to Shiki Land Tower Freely with Issac, and Silke Angert who each the last son and daughter of one of the Strong Ukrainian Mafia, Ugo Angert.(in Earth Mode)
